mapper.select:
WITH _eq_net_ok_tb AS ( SELECT device_id, receive_date, Remote_control FROM QT_MODEL_DDC.ALL_DEVICE_REMOTE_CONTROL_DETAIL WHERE receive_date > minutes_sub(now(), 5) ),
_eq_ttl_tb AS ( SELECT b.company_name, b.dep_name, b.group_name, a.device_id, a.device_m_id, a.devicetype, a.machine_no, c.pbox_id FROM QT_MODEL_EMS.T_DEVICE_CALCGD1JH1U82GWWIONK a LEFT JOIN QT_MODEL_EMS.V_CODE_NAME b ON a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code LEFT JOIN QT_MODEL_EMS.T_PBOX_INFO c ON a.device_id = c.dev_id LEFT JOIN QT_MODEL_EMS.T_COLLECTOR_PROGRAM d ON c.collector_program_id = d.id
AND b.dep_name IN
#{item}
and devicetype = #{imEqsNetworkingAndRemoteInfoVo.deviceType}
and devicetype in
#{item}
),
_eq_ttl_net_info_tb AS ( SELECT company_name, dep_name, group_name, devicetype, device_m_id, machine_no, pbox_id, Remote_control, net_status, CASE WHEN (Remote_control REGEXP '^-?[0-9]+(\.[0-9]+)?$' AND net_status = 1 AND ((devicetype IN ('AA', 'DB', 'HM') AND Remote_control = '2') OR (devicetype = 'WB' AND Remote_control = '5'))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END remote_status FROM ( SELECT a.company_name, a.dep_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype, a.device_m_id, a.machine_no, a.pbox_id, b.Remote_control, CASE WHEN b.Remote_control IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS net_status FROM _eq_ttl_tb a LEFT JOIN _eq_net_ok_tb b ON a.device_id = b.device_id ) a ),
_eq_offline_info_group_tb AS ( select case when a.company_name is null then '总计' else a.company_name end as company_name, case when a.group_name is null then '小计' else a.group_name end as group_name,
case when a.devicetype is null then '小计' else a.devicetype end as devicetype,
count(1) offline_eqs from _eq_ttl_net_info_tb a where net_status = 0 group by
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name)
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype)
),
_eq_ttl_info_group_tb AS ( select case when a.company_name is null then '总计' else a.company_name end as company_name, case when a.group_name is null then '小计' else a.group_name end as group_name,
case when a.devicetype is null then '小计' else a.devicetype end as devicetype,
count(1) ttl_eqs from _eq_ttl_net_info_tb a group by
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name)
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype)
)
select case when a.company_name is null then '总计' else a.company_name end as company_name, case when a.group_name is null then '小计' else a.group_name end as group_name,
case when a.devicetype is null then '小计' else a.devicetype end as devicetype,
a.ttl_eqs, nvl(b.offline_eqs, 0) offline_eqs from _eq_ttl_info_group_tb a left join _eq_offline_info_group_tb b on a.company_name = b.company_name and a.group_name = b.group_name
and a.devicetype = b.devicetype
order by (case company_name when "台虹厂区" then 1 when "古城厂区" then 2 when "汉浦厂区" then 3 when "QT_India" then 4 else 5 end), (case when group_name like "%COB一%" then 1 when group_name like "%COB二%" then 2 when group_name like "%COB三%" then 3 when group_name like "%COB四%" then 4 when group_name like "%COB五%" then 5 when group_name like "%COB六%" then 6 when group_name like "%COB七%" then 7 when group_name like "%COB八%" then 8 when group_name like "%COB九%" then 9 when group_name like "%COB十%" then 10 when group_name like "%试产一%" then 11 when group_name like "%试产二%" then 12 when group_name like "%试产三%" then 13 when group_name like "%一%" then 14 when group_name like "%二%" then 15 when group_name like "%三%" then 16 when group_name like "%修复%" then 17 else 20 end)
, a.devicetype
